Node overview

Nodes are items that can be dragged onto the canvas to create a flow. A set of nodes with specific functions are available in Event Processing to create stream processing flows. You can configure and connect the nodes to suit your requirements.

Nodes are categorized into three sections as:

  • Events
  • Processors
  • Joins
